actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to provide that investigations of deaths, disappearances, or serious injuries of individuals while aboard naval vessels shall be conducted by the Judge Advocate General of the Navy.

summary.text: States that if any individual dies, disappears, or is seriously injured under circumstances which require an investigation pursuant to regulation prescribed by the Secretary of the Navy, such investigation shall be conducted by the Judge Advocate General of the Navy in accordance with regulations. (Adds 10 U.S.C. 6035)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to provide that investigations of deaths, disappearances, or serious injuries of individuals while aboard naval vessels shall be conducted by the Judge Advocate General of the Navy.
